## 1.2 Students 

### Question 3

```{r}
students <- read_delim(
  here("datafold", "students.csv"),
  col_types = cols(
    birth_date = col_date(),
    group = col_factor(),
    id = col_integer()
  )
)
```

The `birth_date` column of the `students` data frame is of class *`r class(students$birth_date)`*.
